Title: What's Yours Is Mine
Description:
The elders want us to mount a defense? We're not monks, $c; we need weapons if we hope to fight!

Scavenge some arms from those barbarians for me. I should be able to melt them down and make something more suitable for our villagers to fight with.

Bring me as many as you can carry and I'll take care of the rest.
ObjectivesText: Retrieve 6 Stolen Weapons from the Zandalari Invaders.
CompletionText: We'll need more than luck to get us through this. I hope you found something I can work with.
RewardText:
Well, these are better than I had anticipated! I can make four spears for every one of their blades.

Don't you worry, I'll make sure the villagers are armed when the time comes.
